relationships.parent: Proud of my achievements so far

personality.giri: Protect You Ito, as a yojimbo (bodyguard), until artifacts are transported.
personality.ninjo: Glory. Seeking glory, may cause me to disobey orders, and leave my post.
personality.first_notice: Brash, boisterous, and eager to prove martial prowess.
personality.stress: Tenses up, often reaching for a weapon. Takes concerted effort not to act with hostility when in social settings.
personality.death: Striving for glory in combat, whether on the field of battle, or a duel for an enemy general's head.

personality.giri: Keep the borders of the unicorn safe from the influence of other clans and entities.
personality.ninjo: See the world and fall in love.

description.activation: As a Support action, you may make a **TN 2 Theology (Earth) check** targeting yourself.
description.effect: You summon and equip a suit of armor that grants physical resistance equal to your Earth Ring plus your bonus successes and has the Cumbersome and Wargear qualities. The armor persists for a number of rounds equal to your Earth Ring, at which point it tumbles to the ground as loose stones or dirt.

opportunities.effect: This effect persists until the end of the scene instead.
The armor you summon has the Durable quality.
The armor you summon has the Sacred quality.

description.activation: As an Attack action, you may make a **TN 2 theology (Earth) check** targeting one character at range 0-3.
description.effect:
If you succeed and the target is an Otherworldly being, you smite and purify it with searing jade energy. It suffers a critical strike with severity equal to your Earth Ring plus your bonus successes. The creature may spend {{opportunity}}{{opportunity}} from its check to resist this critical strike to conceal that it has been affected, potentially concealing its Otherworldly nature (though it still suffers the effect that it successfully hid).
If you succeed and your target is not a an Otherworldly being, it suffers no ill effect.

opportunities.effect: If you succeed, each target that is an Otherworldly being suffers the Silenced condition and cannot use maho techniques until the end of your next turn.

description.activation: When you make a **Martial Arts [Melee, Ranged, or Unarmed] (Earth) check** , you may spend {{opportunity}} in the following way:
description.effect: **Earth {{opportunity}}+:** Treat your physical resistance as 1 higher per {{opportunity}} spent this way until the beginning of your next turn.

description.activation: As an Attack action, you may make a **TN 3 Theology (Earth) check** targeting one Otherworldly being at range 0-2.
description.effect: If you succeed, crackling arcs of jade light smite and purify your target; it must resist with a **TN 4 Fitness (Air 2, Water 5) check** or suffer the Immobilized and Silenced conditions. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to your Earth Ring.

opportunities.effect: Each target that fails its Fitness check to resist is bound until the end of the scene instead.
Each target that fails its Fitness check to resist is bound for one year instead.
Increase the TN of checks to resist this effect by 1 per {{opportunity}}{{opportunity}} spent this way
Each target that fails its Fitness check to resist is bound for one hundred years instead .

personality.giri: Retrieve a set of sacred artifacts
personality.ninjo: Become the greatest duelist in the empire
personality.first_notice: Wears an eye patch on his right eye
personality.stress: Fight his way out if things appear bad
personality.death: In a magnificent duel at a celebration of the Emperor's honour

relationships.parent: Proud of my achievements so far

description.activation: Once per game session as an action, you may make a **TN 2 Meditation (Void) check to seek cosmic wisdom regarding a quandary in front of you.
description.effect: If you succeed, you receive a brief vision or hear the voice of Togashi providing a hint regarding one way you might proceed (which the GM should furnish). This hint should not be the full answer, but it should help you move forward toward a solution or at least formulate a plan of action.

opportunities.effect: Reduce the TN of your first check to overcome the problem you are facing by your school rank (to a minimum of 1).

description.activation: As a Movement and Support action , you may make a **TN 1 Meditation (Water) check**. You may choose one character at range 0-1 as the target for the burst effect.
description.enhancement:
If you succeed, this kiho activates . While this kiho is active, when you perform the Calming Breath action, you may remove 2 fatigue instead of 1.
While this kiho is active, after you perform an action, you may spend 1 Void point to remove fatigue equal to your ranks in Medicine from one other character at range 0-1.
description.burst: If you have 2 or more bonus successes, your target removes fatigue equal to your ranks in Medicine plus your bonus successes. Each target cannot be affected by this effect again until the end of the scene.

description.activation: As an Attack and Support action, you may make a **TN 2 Martial Arts [Unarmed] (Earth)** check to control the earth around you. When you perform this action, you may choose any number of other characters at range 0-1 as targets for the burst effect.
description.enhancement: If you succeed, this kiho activates. While this kiho is active, after you perform an Attack or Support action, or defend against damage, you may choose one other character at range 0-2 who must resist with a **TN 4 Fitness check (Air 2, Water 5)** or suffer physical damage equal to your Earth Ring and the Prone condition.
description.burst: If you have two or more bonus successes, each target suffers physical damage equal to your Earth Ring. Each Prone target suffers physical damage equal to your Earth Ring plus your bonus successes and the Immobilized condition instead.

description.activation: As a Support action, you may activate this kibo. When you do so, you may make a **TN 1 Meditation (Earth) check** to gain an awareness of your surroundings.
description.enhancement: If you succeed, this kiho activates. While this kiho is active, you can use vibrations through the earth to "see" a number of ranged bands in all directions equal to your Earth Ring. While this kiho is active increase your vigilance by your Earth Ring.
description.burst: If you succeed with three or more bonus successes, you instantly become aware of all living creatures and objects touching the ground within a number of range bands equal to your Earth Ring plus your bonus successes.

description.activation: When you make a **Martial Arts [Melee, Ranged, or Unarmed] (Air) check** , you may spend {{opportunity}} in the following way:
description.effect: **Air {{opportunity}}+:** Reserve one of your rolled dice, plus one additional die per {{opportunity}}{{opportunity}} spent this way. These dice become dropped dice. When making a check with the same skill before the end of your next turn, you may roll one fewer {{ring-die}} per reserved {{ring-die}} and one fewer {{skill-die}} per reserved {{skill-die}}, then add the reserved dice to your roll. These dice count as rolled dice, but are added set to the results they had when they were reserved.

description.activation: When you make a **Martial Arts [Melee, Ranged, or Unarmed] (Earth) check** , you may spend {{opportunity}} in the following way:
description.effect: **Earth {{opportunity}}+:** Treat your physical resistance as 1 higher per {{opportunity}} spent this way until the beginning of your next turn.

personality.giri: To expand my clan's influence with other clans as a Yojimbo
personality.ninjo: I wish to be a protector of the Heimin and think my clan has become to prideful for its own good
personality.first_notice: A red Mempō mask is commonly worn - her midback has a branding mark from her gempukku.
personality.stress: My Matsu blood comes out at times and I become the passion and violence of the lion made manifest
personality.death: "Defending those under my charge, my foes laid across the ground defeated and those I was protecting safe from harm"

relationships.other: Sensei from the Asahina Artificer School
relationships.parent: They admire my discipline and battlefield prowess, but are concerned about my unorthodox beliefs and humility

personality.giri: To pass the Topaz Championship and succeed on your gempuku
personality.ninjo: To become the greatest leader of the Akodo ever
personality.first_notice: Intense Gaze, tall by Lion standards
personality.stress: Mental over-loading that results in increased hostility
personality.death: To die of old age yet remain immortal by his deeds

relationships.parent: unsatisfied by the merits of sucess but driven to excellence beyond what's expected

personality.giri: To expand my family's influence through diplomacy, friendship....and blackmail
personality.ninjo: I long to be free from the cut-throat court games and live in peace
personality.first_notice: Shorter hair than the most Crane, beauty that's both ethereal and mundane.
personality.stress: Emotional outbursts when unmasking. Otherwise uses a fan to help cover her expression
personality.death: Old and happy surrounded by her family

relationships.other: Healthy connections with the Kakita and Doji family heads and their friends/family
relationships.parent: The ideal child, though some more ambition would be welcome; they remain ignorant of her thoughts, however.

personality.ninjo: I wish to surpass my siblings and parents and become the Lion Clan Champion
personality.first_notice: A very intense look in his eyes, tall for a Lion clan samurai
personality.stress: Noticeable mental overload- wild eyes, panicked breathing, white knuckle grip on weapons
personality.death: Old but immortal from my deeds

relationships.otherRelationships: Nonsubstantial due to how recluse he is
relationships.parentRelationship: A shy, polite boy who upon first meeting his eyes, fixes you with a particular gaze that is neither unsettling nor pacifying. He is quick to learn and of a humble countenance, but is at times consumed by a unique fixation on the lessers of our family's history.

characters.name: Utaku (Family) Wasurenagusa (Pseudonym) Yunikōn (Clan Name) - (Heridatary title) Harue (True name) Risa (Child Name)

personality.giri:
Harue is serving as bushi to Miko Ereyko. The mistress is a daimyo from Utaku family.  
Wasurenagusa showed willful character and command abilities. She is running martial squad.
personality.ninjo: Harue is very ambitious person - she wants power, attention, glory. She will take a position as daimyo, then as clan leader or even as shogun.
personality.first_notice: First thing people notice in Harue it is her her unique blonde hair and deep blue eyes.
personality.death: Harue doesn`t care if she will die in battle or in warm bed, but she want die as glorious leader and as famous person.

relationships.otherRelationships:
Harue doesn`t care about person status or origin, but she respect people before they give her point to think opposit. 
As Utaku Battle Maiden she believes that women also have to have equal rigth with males.
As unicorn she trusts and have great respect to her clan. But she also respects tradisions of athe clans, even lions.
The only gruop she dislikes is Lion clan. When she has an opportunity to bully them or to damege the clan she uses it. She views Lion Clan as personal enemy.
At the moment Lion clan doesn`t see Harue as enemy, but they know her hostility to them
relationships.parentRelationship: Before Harue went to Utaku school she liked playing with dolls. She liked making up and dressing it. Also she often helped courts ladies with spinning and make up
